title: Train fault causing delays on Circle Line

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Train services between #Stadium and #DhobyGhaut are now operating normally.
[CCL] UPDATE: Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time between #Stadium and #DhobyGhaut due to train fault.
[CCL]: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time from #PayaLebar to #DhobyGhaut towards #DhobyGhaut due to train fault.
